CustomField.description: Use this field to specify the SObject API name to bind to when the "Binding Object" field does not list that particular SObject. Only specify the "Binding Object" field or this one; not both.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to specify the SObject API name to bind to when the "Binding Object" field does not list that particular SObject. Only specify the "Binding Object" field or this one; not both.
CustomField.label: Binding Object Alternate
